title: List of Square Enix video games
summary: Square Enix is a Japanese video game development and publishing company formed from the merger of video game developer Square and publisher Enix on April 1, 2003.[1] The company is best known for its role-playing video game franchises, which include the Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest, and Kingdom Hearts series. Of its properties, the Final Fantasy franchise is the best-selling, with total worldwide sales of over 144 million units.[2] The Dragon Quest series has sold over 78 million units worldwide[2] while the Kingdom Hearts series has sold over 24 million copies worldwide.[3] Since its inception, the company has developed or published hundreds of titles in various video game franchises on numerous gaming systems.
